snippet: Uber, a summon-a-car app that has developed a following among moneyed urbanites, is trying to expand its appeal to the less affluent by adding less luxurious cars. Read more »
abstract: Uber, a summon-a-car app that has developed a following among moneyed urbanites, is trying to expand its appeal to the less affluent by adding less luxurious cars. Read more »

headline.main: Uber Plans Cheaper Service Using Hybrids
